entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
